column5: Hey everybody. I'm buying my first boat (new). Does the dealer usually do the licensing stuff for the buyer? Thanks. T.

Yes, if it is new from a dealer, they should register the boat and install the numbers on the hull. If there is a trailer involved, they should get the plate for that as well unless you already have a trailer plate for it.
Any decent dealer should take care of this for you!
I know mine did. When I bought my first boat used, I had to transfer everything myself but the dealer for the new one took care of everything.
